Title: The people's railways, (expanding with) tremendous pace
Designer: Chinese National Science Popularization Association (中华全国科学技术普及协会)
Publisher: Renmin meishu chubanshe (人民美术出版社)
Notes: A 1952 series, devoted to the reconstruction of war damage and new construction of railways.The poster, "Railway employees across the country enthusiastically carried out the full-load, over-axis, and 500-kilometer campaign", shows various experiments to improve efficiency on the railroads.
